reference_details.sylvan_monster: Avatar of Nature, Dragon or Treefather

options.name: Song of Cenyrn
options.description: May be activated when the bearer's unit declares a Charge. The target of the Charge can only declare Hold! as its Charge Reaction, unless it is Shaken. The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if Charged by other units.

options.name: Sacred Seeds
options.description: May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase, if the bearer is unengaged. Duration: Permanent. Place a Forest Terrain Feature in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from enemy units and other Terrain Features. This Forest is a 10×6" rectangle and it follows the normal rules for a Forest, except it is Dangerous Terrain(6+).

options.name: Oaken Might
options.description: +3 Str.

options.name: Banner of Deception
options.description: At the beginning of step 3.E Battle Setup The owner may remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield and deploy it in a new formation following the usual restrictions. Attached Models remain Attached.

options.name: Predator Pennant
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge(Distracting(1)).

options.name: Banner of Silent Mist
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Magic Resistance(1) and is always considered to be in Soft Cover.

options.name: Hunter's Honour
options.description: +1 Str and +1 AP. If the wielder causes at least one HP loss with this weapon, the wielder and all Rank-and-File models in its unit gain Distracting(1) until the end of the Round of Combat.

options.name: Spirit Arrows
options.description: When attacking with this weapon, before rolling to hit; choose one model with Channel in the target unit. The chosen model replaces its Channel(X) with Channel(X-1), with Duration: One Turn.

options.name: Bough Of Wyscan
options.description: Number of Shots is always 1, Str 3, AP 2, Area Attack (1×5), and Direct Hit(Str 6, AP 4, Multiple Wounds(2)).

options.name: Spirit of the Whirlwind
options.description: +1 Att, +1 Str, and +1  AP.

options.name: Mist Walker's Mirror
options.description:
One use only. May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase if the bearer’s unit is Unengaged, consists entirely of Height 1 models, and is fully inside a Forest that is not in contact with enemy models. Apply the following rules:
  • Remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield.
  • Immediately place it back using Ambush(centre of Forest).
If the unit cannot be placed, it is removed as a casualty where it was removed.

options.name: Hail Shot
options.description:
One use only; Duration: Until the end of the Phase; May be activated in the Charge Phase or Shooting Phase. This is a Shooting Weapon with the following profile:
  •
Hail Shot cannot benefit from Forest's Thorns.

options.name: Horn of the Wild Hunt
options.description: One use only. May be activated when a friendly unit within 8" fails a Charge Range roll. The Charge Range roll is rerolled.

options.name: Glyph of Amryl
options.description: The bearer gains +3 Def.

options.name: Shapeshifter
options.description: The model gains +2" Cha and +2" Mob, as well as Solitary,Vanguard, Multiple Wounds(2, towards Height 4-5), Devastating Charge(the model's Height is set to 3).

options.name: Wild Hunter
options.description: The model gains Fearless,Frenzy,Light Troops,Unruly. In addition the model part gains Devastating Charge(+1 Att),Fury,Lethal Strike.

options.name: Pathfinder
options.description:
The model gains ,Forest's Thorns,Scout, Stand and Shoot,Vanguard.
A Sylvan Bow wielded by the model has its Shots set to; 3 if a Chieftain with Captain, otherwise 5.

options.name: Forest Guardian
options.description: The model gains Vanguard. The model and Rank-and-File models in the model's unit gain First Strike(Hatred).

options.name: Blade Dancer
options.description: The model gains Aegis(6+), Dances of Cenyrn (see Blade Dancer unit),Exclusive(Blade Dancer Kindred, Blade Dancers),Fearless,Magic Resistance(1). The model's unit gains Swiftstride, Devastating Charge(Fly).

options.name: Scarred Bark
options.description: The model's unit gains First Strike(Hatred).

options.name: Toxic Spores
options.description: The model's unit's Standard Melee Attacks gain Lethal Strike.

options.name: Entangling Vines
options.description: The model gains Impaling Roots if it did not already have it. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose one enemy Character model in contact with the wielder. During this Round of Combat, Melee Attacks from the chosen model must reroll successful to-hit rolls against the wielder.

options.name: Oaken Crown
options.description: The wearer gains Disciplined, Magic Resistance(2).

options.name: Verdant Rebirth
options.description: This model Recovers 1 HP the first time each Magic Phase that it successfully casts a Learned Spell that targets a friendly unit. The model cannot Recover more than 1 HP in total per Magic Phase from this spell or Fountain of Youth (Druidism).

options.name: Shielding Bark
options.description: +1 HP, Aegis(5+),Fearless, Tree Singing,Weakness(Flaming Attacks). Arm is set to 4 and can never be improved beyond this.

options.name: Skirmisher, Light Lance and Sylvan Bow (3+)
Bone Break Dancer and Sylvan Blades
